ext_description.message: Send NZB links to SABnzbd for download.

page_action_title.message: SABdrop found NZBs on this page

page_action_message.message: SABdrop found NZBs on this page. Click on one to send it to your SABnzbd.
page_action_message.description: Text that is displayed in head of page action popup

options_setting_host_help.message: URL to SABnzbd, optionally with port. For example: http://localhost/sabnzbd/ or http://192.168.80.1:8080/

options_setting_apikey_help.message: API key can be found in the SABnzbd settings

options_setting_popuphide_help.message: After how many milliseconds should the popup disappear? Use 0 to disable popups completely.

options_setting_authmethod_help.message: Choose type of authentication. Preferred method is API key.

options_setting_hidecategories_help.message: Don't show categories (if available) in context menu. All downloads will be put into standard category.

options_setting_matchpatterns_help.message: List of regular expressions that match NZB links in the href attribute of page elements. One pattern per line.

options_verify_none.message: FAILED. SABnzbd doesn't permit remote access
options_verify_none.description: Text when SABnzbd doesn't permit remote access

options_verify_nomatch.message: FAILED. SABnzbd doesn't permit selected authentication method
options_verify_nomatch.description: Text when SABnzbd doesn't permit selected authentication method

options_reset.description: Text for reset to defaults button

options_reset_dialog.message: Do you really want to reset all options to their default values?
options_reset_dialog.description: Text of reset to defaults dialog

sent_popup.description: Text for popup message when link was sent to SABnzbd

error_popup.message: There was an error while sending link to SABnzbd. Please verify connection settings and check console for details.
error_popup.description: Text for popup when an error occurred

context_menu.description: Text of the context menu item

context_menu_nocategory.description: Context menu item for selection of no category
